metadata.title: CVE-2020-26407 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A XSS vulnerability exists in Gitlab CE/EE from 12.4 before 13.4.7, 13.5before 13.5.5, and 13.6 before 13.6.2 that allows an attacker to performcross-site scripting to other users via importing a malicious project

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
